product_name: Topeak Smartphone Drybag for iPhone 5 - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Designed specifically for the iPhone 5, this Topeak Smartphone Dry Bag delivers waterproof protection for your device and mounts securely on your bike's handlebar for easy access while riding.
short_description: Designed specifically for the iPhone 5, this Topeak Smartphone Dry Bag delivers waterproof protection for your device and mounts securely on your bike's handlebar for easy access while riding.
